alert.note: Alert for Boyd (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:24PM CDT until June 24 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOYD COUNTY... At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lynch, or 15 miles east of Spencer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lynch and Monowi. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 136 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
